footer.title: TahOak Park Collective
footer.description: A hyper-local discovery platform for genuinely local businesses, organizations, and community resources.

home.subtitle: Discover local entities in your community
home.exploreOnMapDescription: See all entities on an interactive map
home.tryAdjustingSearch: Try adjusting your search or filters to find what you're looking for.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: TahOak Park Collective – Non-extractive, community-first discovery.
about.missionText1: TahOak Park Collective is a hyper-local discovery platform designed to help residents find genuinely local businesses, organizations, resources, public spaces, and key recurring community events.
about.missionText2: Rather than prioritizing "what's closest" or "highest SEO," we focus on real relationships to the neighborhood: where owners live, where activities actually happen, and who explicitly focuses on and invests in our community.
about.inclusionText: We include entities that meet our definition of "local":
about.presenceText: Physically operates in the coverage area (brick-and-mortar address, recurring pop-up location, or resident home-based service)
about.contributionText: Provides life infrastructure, social places, support/equity, or ecosystem support to the community
about.excludeText: National and regional chains are completely excluded. This is a directory for genuinely local entities that have a real connection to our neighborhoods.
about.creditsText1: TahOak Park Collective is built and maintained by
about.creditsText3: This project serves as both a community resource and a portfolio piece demonstrating product design, UX, and local hosting capabilities.
about.feedbackText: Have questions, suggestions, or want to report an issue? We'd love to hear from you.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using TahOak Park Collective ("the Platform"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.useLicenseText1: Permission is granted to temporarily use the Platform for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
terms.commercialUse: use the materials for any commercial purpose, or for any public display (commercial or non-commercial);
terms.reverseEngineer: attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on the Platform;
terms.removeCopyright: remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials.
terms.imageLicensingText1: By uploading images to the Platform, you grant TahOak Park Collective a non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual license to:
terms.displayImages: Display, reproduce, and distribute the images in connection with your entity listing
terms.promotionalUse: Use the images for promotional purposes related to the Platform
terms.replaceImages: Allow administrators to replace images with higher-quality or verified safe images (e.g., photos taken by volunteers)
terms.imageLicensingText2: You represent and warrant that you own or have the necessary rights to grant this license for all images you upload. You retain ownership of your images, but grant the Platform the right to use them as described above.
terms.userContentText: You are responsible for all content you submit to the Platform. You agree not to submit any content that is illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, or violates any third-party rights. Administrators reserve the right to remove any content that violates these terms.
terms.disclaimerText: The materials on TahOak Park Collective are provided on an 'as is' basis. TahOak Park Collective makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
terms.limitationsText: In no event shall TahOak Park Collective or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on the Platform.
terms.accuracyText: The materials appearing on TahOak Park Collective could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. TahOak Park Collective does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete, or current. TahOak Park Collective may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice.
terms.modificationsText: TahOak Park Collective may revise these terms of service at any time without notice. By using this Platform, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.
terms.contactText: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionText: TahOak Park Collective ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our Platform.
privacy.entityInfoText: Business/organization details you provide when claiming or creating listings
privacy.contactInfoText: Email addresses provided for subscriptions, suggestions, or issue reports
privacy.contentText: Images, descriptions, and other content you upload
privacy.automaticallyCollectedText: IP address and browser information (for security and analytics)
privacy.usageData: Usage data through privacy-focused analytics (self-hosted Umami)
privacy.howWeUseText: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.providePlatform: Provide, maintain, and improve the Platform
privacy.processAccount: Process and manage your account and entity listings
privacy.sendUpdates: Send you email updates (if you've subscribed with double opt-in)
privacy.respond: Respond to your inquiries and requests
privacy.protect: Protect against fraudulent or unauthorized activity
privacy.subscriptionsText: We use a double opt-in process for email subscriptions. You must verify your email address before receiving updates. You can manage your preferences or unsubscribe at any time using the magic links we provide.
privacy.transactionalText: We send essential emails related to your account, entity claims, and platform notifications. These cannot be opted out of as they are necessary for Platform functionality.
privacy.analyticsText: We use a self-hosted, privacy-focused analytics tool (Umami) that does not use cookies or track personal information. We only collect aggregate data about page views and visitor patterns. No cookie banners are required.
privacy.informationSharingText: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information. We may share information:
privacy.serviceProviders: With service providers who assist in operating the Platform (e.g., email service)
privacy.requiredByLaw: When required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.publicInfo: Entity information you choose to make public (business listings are visible to all visitors)
privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information, including password hashing (bcrypt) and secure data transmission. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.access: Access and update your account information
privacy.delete: Delete your account (contact us to request deletion)
privacy.unsubscribe: Unsubscribe from email communications (use the unsubscribe link in emails)
privacy.requestInfo: Request information about the data we hold about you
privacy.childrensPrivacyText: Our Platform is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
privacy.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
privacy.contactUsText: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please

tags.pageDescription: Create and manage tags for entities. Tags help categorize businesses by identity, friendliness, and amenities.

dashboard.pendingApprovalsDescription: Review and approve pending entity listings
dashboard.reviewApprovalsDescription: Review new entities and changes awaiting approval.
dashboard.pendingDescription: Review new entities and changes submitted by users and AI.

common.notesPlaceholder: Add any notes about this decision...

alerts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this entity? This action cannot be undone.

quickAdd.title: Quick Add Entity
quickAdd.description: Enter an entity name to automatically research and add it to the pending queue.
quickAdd.hint: The system assumes the entity is in the TahOak Park Collective coverage area
quickAdd.step1: AI researches the entity using web search
quickAdd.step2: Checks for duplicates against existing entities
quickAdd.step3: Extracts all relevant information (address, phone, website, etc.)
quickAdd.step4: Creates approval request for your review

spotChecks.title: Spot Checks
spotChecks.description: Weekly spot check list. Review 3-5 entities to ensure data quality. Entities not checked in 6+ months are prioritized.
spotChecks.tipText: Review each entity and verify that the information is accurate. Click "Mark as Checked" when complete.

approvals.title: Approvals
approvals.description: Review and approve or reject entity submissions and changes.
approvals.noMatches: No items match the selected filters.

issueReports.title: Issue Reports
issueReports.description: Review and resolve issue reports from the community about entity listings.
issueReports.resolveDescription: Please describe how this issue was resolved.
issueReports.dismissDescription: Please explain why this issue is being dismissed.

subscribers.title: Subscribers

subscribers.tryAdjusting: Try adjusting your search or filter.
subscribers.noMatch: No subscribers match the selected filter.
